Pacotes necessários
```{r waning=F}
if(!require(pacman)) install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load("tidyverse", "readxl", "LexisPlotR")
```

Carregando tabelas do SIM e do SINASC

```{r}
death <- read.csv("Data/SIM_2000-2023_RS.csv", sep = ";")
birth <- read.csv("Data/sinasc_2000-2023_RS.csv", sep = ";")

```

selecionando somente as colunas e linhas que serão utilizadas

```{r}
birth <- birth %>%
  select(Ano.do.nascimento, Total)

death <- death %>%
  select(Ano.do.Obito, Total)

death <- death[1:24, ]
```



```{r}
lexis <- lexis_grid(year_start = 2000, year_end = 2023, age_start = 0, age_end = 5) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) 
  

polygons <- data.frame(group = c(1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2),
                       x = c("1901-01-01", "1902-01-01", "1902-01-01", "1903-01-01", "1904-01-01", "1904-01-01"),
                       y = c(1, 1, 2, 1, 1, 2))

lexis_year(lg = lexis, year = 2003)

?geom_polygon()
```
